EmailTemplate.name: 202002_EMEAI_BGA_Email_MSP-HTF-Nacelle.Email HTF7000 Nacelle Audience 2 - Embrae
EmailTemplate.subject: Now Available - New Coverage Options for HTF7000 Nacelles
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
We are excited to announce that we are introducing a new feature as part of our OEM Maintenance Service Program. Designed exclusively to cover nacelles on the HTF7000 engine series we can now offer an array of options that fit your operational requirements, reduce costs and increase efficiencyâ€”all of which are designed to deliver peace of mind for you.
MSP for HTF Nacelle comes packed with features that include routine inspections, treatment, and repair of on-wing corrosion issues or replacement of nacelle components when Beyond Economic Repair (BER). This makes it the perfect choice for your aircraft.
Already enrolled in Nacelle coverage with Embraer? Update your coverage with our MSP for HTF Nacelle to include corrosion coverage amongst all the additional benefits you will be receiving.
Book an appointment with a member of our team to learn more. BOOK AN APPOINTMENT <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/htf7000-nacelle-coverage?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp]]>
